title: eSports club Stuttgart sucht D3+ Spieler für die 2. Division der ESL Meisterschaft!
body:
eSports club Stuttgart (e Sports club based in Germany - Stuttgart) looking for players to compete in the ESL Meisterschaft 2nd Division.

Current team:
Team Manager: SeS Invisible
Coach: -
Top: -
Jungle: SeS Gramuny
Mid: -
ADC: -
SUPP: -

ADC, Supp are already filled.

Requirements to join our team:
- at least D3 in EUW
- from Europe
- competitive champion pool
- the goal to join the first Division in the summer split
- at least 16 years old
- you need discord + mic
- fluent english
- Coach, Top, Mid

if you are interested add me ingame: SeS Invisible

replies.body:
Schaut gerne mal in unserem neuen Discord für Gamer aus dem Raum Stuttgart vorbei, vielleicht findet ihr da ja jemanden:
[https://discord.gg/WwKvEaz](https://discord.gg/WwKvEaz)
